long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Telugu Autocomplete Assistant by Perceptive Analytics

Enhance your Telugu typing experience with our innovative and free Chrome extension! Developed by Perceptive Analytics, a leading data analytics company, this tool combines sophisticated artificial intelligence and natural language processing to make typing in Telugu more efficient and accurate. This project has been a long-term endeavor by our team, dedicated to improving user experience for Telugu speakers.

Key Features:
1. Word Completion: Intelligently completes the current word you're typing.
2. Sentence Completion: Suggests the next word in continuation of your sentence.

Secondary Features: 
1. Darkmode: For people who prefer dark mode for visual purposes.
2. Thintext: A thin text is shown as the predictions returned by the model 
3. Enable/Disable: A button to remember sites where Telugu Autocomplete Assistant needs to work. 


Perfect for Telugu speakers who want to type faster and more accurately in their native language. Whether you're composing emails, writing documents, or chatting online, our extension streamlines your Telugu typing process.

About Perceptive Analytics:
Perceptive Analytics is a trusted partner to global clients across multiple sectors, with deep knowledge of retail, e-commerce, and pharmaceutical industries. Recognized by Analytics India Magazine as one of the top 10 companies to watch in the field, we've served over 350 clients with a 70% repeat business rate.

We specialize in data analytics, business intelligence, and reporting, thriving on complex projects where our keen analysis can generate game-changing results. Our team of sought-after analytical, technical, statistical, and business consulting minds delivers world-class service and second-to-none results at competitive rates.

At Perceptive Analytics, we're driven by values of respect, intelligence, outcome-focus, relationship-building, transparency, and a big vision. We're committed to creating measurable value with high ROI, proven through case studies.

Experience the value delivered by Perceptive Analytics through Telugu Autocomplete Assistant. Download now and transform your Telugu typing experience!
